B

banUser(Session) - Method in class ChatProject.ServerGUI
This method banUser simply remembers the IP address of the client that was banned in the blackList when clients connect they have to got through a check point it takes their IP and checks if the blackList has this IP if not connection is established if yes the client is disconnected socket closed
Board - Class in ChessGameKenai
The Board class is the Board of our Chess Game it consists of a JPanel with the 8 by 8 layout it also has squares and some squares will have pieces on them and some will not This class is an Observer so each time change happens to the data class it is notified by executing its update method The Board gets the non visual pieces array list from the data class when its update method is called and asks the non visual pieces for their color, type and position and them replaces them with visual pieces that each non visual piece represents it is happened each time the move method of the data class is called thus executing this method The Board also knows how to flip itself it only changes the view nothing is change in the code Also depending on who's turn it is the listeners will be added or removed
Board(Chess_Data, ChessBoardView) - Constructor for class ChessGameKenai.Board
The overloaded constructor of the class sets the layout of the board to 8 by 8 adds the squares the board by calling setSquares method It also creates a map that we use to map the images when non visual piece is we use to draw images.
broadcast(Object) - Method in class ChatProject.ServerGUI.Server
The method broadcast broadcasts messages to all the clients that are connected to the server and this method does something a little more like show the conversations when server wants to see it simply by changing the boolean value to false the first isConverationHidden is for the Conversations Tab The second is for the connections tab for chatting with clients or simply view the conversations
